Text: Angelcorpse:  They formed in 1995, with a line-up of Helmkamp, guitarist Gene Palubicki, and drummer John Longstreth, and recorded a demo, "Goats to Azazael", which led to a contract with Osmose Productions.

2:
--------------------
Text: Angelcorpse:  The band's debut album, "Hammer of Gods", was released in 1996, after which rhythm guitarist Bill Taylor joined, playing on second album "Exterminate" (1998).
